mobs.keywords: pig swine pink mud creature lazy large
mobs.long_desc: A large creature of pink and mud rests its lazy body near you.
mobs.desc: This pig enjoys doing two things, eating and sleeping.  You have caught him in the second stage, his noontime nap.  Although he may look gentle, or rather disgusting, a row of sharp as knife teeth are bared in between gentle snores.

mobs.keywords: pig piglet curly snout swine pink
mobs.long_desc: A small little piglet runs around your feet and under your legs.
mobs.desc: This newly borned creature has a little curled tail and a moist snout.  It runs around you like you were one of its brothers or sisters and splashes mud everywhere.

mobs.long_desc: The old Fruit Wizard bends over to survey his plants.
mobs.desc: This ancient man has been working on the same farm for over a millenium, a job he took to bring in crops for the farmer's great great great great..  Well you get the idea.  His only love is for his plants, which he tends to as if they were his parents and his children.  He has a large crooked hat and ancient symbols of fertility and growth are in every available spot on his long flowing yellow robe.

mobs.keywords: gnomish gnome field hand fieldhand fiel fie han gnom gno small worker worke work
mobs.long_desc: A small gnomish field hand tiredly raises his head at your approach.
mobs.desc: The small creature looks heavily overworked with the burden of getting the farmer's crops in by time.  What will happen if he doesn't meet his goal can be shown by the many scars running across his arms and legs.  The gnome is well built from years of hard labor.  His grizzly beard stretches far beneath girdle and his knobby knees crack as he bends to tend another crop.

mobs.keywords: large white black cow munch heifer grass larg whit blac heif eating
mobs.long_desc: A large black and white cow munches on the grass.
mobs.desc: This black spotted on milk white cow looks well fed with a nice shiny fur coat.  You can see his jaw working on some fresh cud brought up from one of its many stomachs.  A large cow bell dangles from its neck, and its pink nose glistens with a slimy substance.  It doesn't seem to take notice of your presence.

mobs.keywords: rabbit white small furry rabbi whit smal furr
mobs.long_desc: A furry white rabbit jumps into your path.
mobs.desc: The small creature darts from you and into the nearest bush.  Its glaring red eyes peer back at you with tremendous fear.  The rabbit has a creamy white coat with a few brown spots on its hind.

mobs.keywords: strutting strut stru strutt strutti struttin male cock rooster rooste roost roos roo feathers wings large feather
mobs.long_desc: A proud brown and red rooster struts his walk.
mobs.desc: This cocky little creature has a wingspan just short of a dwarf's armspan, but what it lacks in size it makes up in cockiness.  The arrogant farm animal walks up near you, claws at the ground and bawks at your boots before heading off in the other direction.

mobs.long_desc: A hen with the color of pure white searches for a place to roost.
mobs.desc: A flurry of white feathers is all you get when you try to get a closer look at the pearl white hen.

mobs.keywords: small little salamander salamande salamand salaman salama sala sal smal sma littl litt lit munching munchin munchi munch munc mun
mobs.long_desc: A small little salamander munches noisily on its insect victims.
mobs.desc: The shiny, tiny green lizard slowly turns its head looking for another meal. Although incredibly small, the nimble amphibian looks like a ready fight for one not trained.

mobs.keywords: small smal marshland marshlan marshla marshl marsh mars mar mosquito mosquit mosqui mosqu mosq mos sma
mobs.long_desc: A small marshland mosquito hovers just above the ground near you.
mobs.desc: This breed of species is slightly larger then its brethren.  Its needle like nose extends about 6 inches, while its body covers nearly 3 inches in diameter. Its sphere like body bulges from the blood it carries from its last irritated victim.  Watch out for that sharp nose!

mobs.keywords: great grea gre mountain mountai mounta mount moun mou bronze bronz bron bro pawing pawin pawi paw horse hors hor steed stee ste
mobs.long_desc: A great mountain of bronze lies before you, pawing at the ground.
mobs.desc: This especially wild steed is constantly shifting, making the earth beneath you vibrate from its large hooves contacting on the hard packed ground.  The beautiful bronze coat on the horse matches its mane that bounces in the air with every trot.

mobs.long_desc: A small riding pony trots along the path.
mobs.desc: The small riding pony has a reddish-brown tinge.  Its wide shoulders and strong leg muscles suggest the powerful beast can keep up with its steed cousins.

mobs.keywords: slimy alligator alligato alligat slim eye cold sinister
mobs.long_desc: A set of cold, sinister eyes peer at you from the corner of your eye.
mobs.desc: It's body is submerged into the surrounding water, but the eyes give off a hungry look as they slowly turn their gaze towards you.

objects.ground: A small overflowing well lies in the middle of the cranberry patch.
objects.action_desc: The large well once supplied water to the surrounding farmlands until a backwash in the underground aquifer pushed water up the long well's walls and overspilled onto the surrounding area, now its' continuous supply of rushing water makes the area's produce ideal for the exotic cranberry.

extras.text: The large well once supplied water to the surrounding farmlands until a back wash in the underground aquifer pushed water up the long well's walls and overspilled onto the surrounding area, now its continuous supply of rushing of rushing water makes the area's produce ideal for the exotic cranberry.

objects.ground: A flowing yellow robe lies crumpled on the ground.

extras.text: The robe glows brighter the nearer you go to inspect it.  Its large symbols depict the tale of seasons and weather patterns long past.  Its owner must have grown dumb to have left such a magical item lying around.

objects.ground: A small bronze cow bell with a leather strap lies here.

extras.text: The bell is attached to a leather strap which has a diameter large enough to fit around a medium-sized man's waist, but a snug fit around a large cow's neck.

objects.ground: A dirty dented digging spade is submerged into the ground near you.

extras.text: This sturdy digging tool has a very thick wooden handle and a heavy iron flat blade that can be pressed into the ground with the foot.  Its various uses around the farm make it an invaluable tool.

objects.ground: A long handled tool with a flat blade is submerged into the ground.

extras.text: This tool has a flat iron blade that is attached approximately at a right angle to a long oak handle.  The tool could be used for weeding, cultivating, or gardening.

objects.ground: A thin hollow staff glows with a green aura.
objects.action_desc: $n taps $p on the ground three times.

extras.text: The thin staff is as light as a hollowed out tube, but as strong as any metal sword picked off the forge.  The green glow radiating from the brown oak gives the impression that the stick is naturally green.  The glow seems to emanate a deep wisdom.

objects.ground: A cute little flower grows out of the ground here.

extras.text: Aww, isn't it cute?  This flower is a bright red color and smells sweet.  It's just the kind of thing that a boy would give to a girl he likes.

objects.ground: A small carrot is growing here.

extras.text: Yummy, it's a freshly-picked small carrot!  Young carrots are the best because they are sweeter than full-grown carrots.  They're good for your eyesight too!

objects.ground: An orange pumpkin is resting on the ground here.

extras.text: One of the classic autumn vegetables, the pumpkin is large, orange, meaty, and has a very high sugar content.  It's great for making pies or carving into a lantern for the fall holidays.

objects.ground: Cherry tomatoes grow on a vine here.

extras.text: With that acrid smell that follows fresh-grown tomatos, these small red tomatos are only about the size of cherries.  The vine has four of them on it. Tomatos are usually used in sauces, but this smaller variety would go well on a salad.

objects.ground: Some purple orbs grow on a vine here.

extras.text: Yummy, these grapes are fresh and just a little bit tart.  They're very juicy and seem like snacking grapes rather than the type of grapes used to make wine.

objects.ground: A long yellow fruit is growing here.

extras.text: It has a tough outer skin, but feels slightly squishy around the center portion.  On both ends of the fruit are browned nubs.  One end looks as if it has been broken off a branch or stem.  The fruit has a curious smell, quite strong and sweet.

objects.ground: A brown sphere rolls along on the ground here.

extras.text: A brown husk protects the white meat of this nutty fruit from predators.  The inside is also filled with a creamy, sweet milk-like liquid.  It's used as an ingredient in many juices or, if dried, can be added to cakes and other sweets.

triggers.name: Anduin_pasture_cow_moo
triggers.commands: * moo mecho %self.name% moos. masound You hear loud moo'ing nearby.

rooms.name: An Old Dirt Packed Road
rooms.description: You are on a dusty hard packed road that runs north to south.  The Great Northern road that runs east to west can be entered by following the trail directly south.  In the west nothing can be seen but the usual plain desert-like stretches of shrubland.  Directly east foothills produce a steady climb that leads wandering from the road difficult.

rooms.name: An Old Dirt Packed Road
rooms.description: You are on a hard dirt packed road that runs north to south.  The countryside begins to appear, pastures can be seen in the northwest, and row after row of rich tropical crops appear in the northeast.  Vast stretches of shrubland fill your vision seeming never to end, while the massive Eldorian Foothills lie directly east.

rooms.name: An Old Dirt Packed Road
rooms.description: You are on a hard dirt packed road that runs north to south.  A large white picket fence connects together forming the corners of two fields parallel to the road.

rooms.name: An Old Dirt Packed Road
rooms.description: You are on a hard dirt packed road that runs north to south.  Two continuous white picket fences run parallel from eachother on both sides of the dirt road. A small house, interestingly painted sky blue, lies directly north where the trail comes to an abrupt end.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Sky Blue House
rooms.description: The farmer's house isn't very large, suitable only for a family of four. He chose an interesting color to paint his homely house, a nice shade of sky blue, which would make any summer's day sky blend with the building from every angle of the farm.  A small pigpen lies directly east of here, and a red barn towers above the farmer's house north.  Small green pastures stretch for as far as you can see west.

rooms.name: A Purple Pigpen
rooms.description: You find yourself in a pigpen, which is half sunk in knee deep mud that overflows a few feet out of the gate perimeter.  There's rotten smelling foods linging in the air above a feeder that displays the contents of the farmer's week old dinner.  The wooden posts and gates surrounding the pen are painted a cheerful bright purple.  A green colored stable rises up in the north, and the farmer's sky blue house can be found in the west.  Row after row of the farm's produce flaunts its shiny green luxurious leaves, the first row starts in the east, and a large hut that seems to be surrounded by a green aura is directly south.

rooms.name: A Large Red Barn
rooms.description: You are in the middle of a large rosy red barn.  Stables built into the east wall were made for the farmer's animals on rainy days.  The barn is also used to keep the farmer's poultry, a little hen house painted brown lies near the west side of the wall.  The barn space in total is enormous.  The roof reaches higher then any other building on the farm.  On the very top of the barn a rusty weather vane depicting a very beautiful creature points to the northwest, the way the wind is blowing.  The farmer's sky blue house is located directly south, and some faint horse dung can be smelled coming from the east.

rooms.name: The South-Western Pastures
rooms.description: Rich green pastures well kept and irrigated fills your vision of the rolling hills west and south of here.  The thick grass keeps the farmer's animals happy and well fed.  A large white picket fence separates the south-western pastures from the north-western pastures directly north of here.  The farmer's sky blue house easily stands out a few spans east.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Pumpkins
rooms.description: Small prickly vines provide cover for the pumpkins, most of the thick green rope spills over the wall and onto the ground near you.  To the north a large white picket fence seperates this field from some green looking pastures.  A pigpen can be entered to your west, and a tomato bush row continues to your east, or you can squeeze your way into an empty lot directly to the south.

rooms.name: A Green Washed Stable
rooms.description: The farmer has decided to paint this solid built horse stable a light green. The grass around the area seems to blend right in with the barn.  Foul smelling horse dung has made a permanent decaying odor of the surrounding area, making any normal person want to hold their breath while in this room.  Row after row seperated by a thin wall is where the horses are kept, now all seem empty, but green pastures to the north and east look perfect for horse grazing grounds. A large deep red barn rises directly west of here, and a purple pen used to keep the farmer's bacon lies south of here.

rooms.name: The Fruit Wizard's Hut
rooms.description: This is a small tidy hut that has no visible entry, where a door should be placed only small runes and magic symbols can be found.  The hut is two levels with a single tinted window on the second floor, large enough to see out and far across the acres of farmland.  A large brick chimney on the side of the hut puffs gray and white smoke out of its top, making an eerie cloud settle in the sky.  A pig pen's purple south gate can be seen in the north, and a patch of beautiful flowers dot both sides of the path leading south.  A lonely vacant lot lies directly east of here.

rooms.name: The Tomato Bush
rooms.description: You are near large bushes full of rich, red tomatoes ripe for the eating. Though here and there small holes dot the leaves and branches seem bare as if eaten by pests.  There are four tomato bushes that are spaced out enough to jump to the next row to the south.  A large white picket fence seperates this row of produce from some very green looking fields to the north.  Directly east a large unnatural fruit tree molds itself out of the ground, and a pumpkin patch starts where the plants end to the west.

rooms.name: Next to the Fruit Tree
rooms.description: Directly to the east lies a huge tree that seems molded out of the ground it sinks its roots in.  The trunks at the base of the tree are larger then any redwood and a canopy of branches and luscious fruit block out any light directly above you.  The tree contains fruit varying from luscious apples to ripe pears lying next to deep red-orange oranges.  A white picket fence connects the northern part of the fruit tree directly east of you and continues its seperation between you and the fields to the north.  A single tomato bush lies to the south leaving plenty of room to make your way deeper into the farm's produce.  A row of tomato bushes continues to the west.

rooms.name: A Row of Towering Coconut Trees
rooms.description: As tall as the largest inns in Anduin these coconut trees have made themselves reknowned as being the only ones able to be grown in this rugged climate.  It almost seems as if the air around you is renewing your body and making you stronger.  The produce west of here begins to get a little wet, and the column of farmer's trees continues to the north and south.  A long dirt road leads away to the east.

rooms.name: The Cranberry Patch
rooms.description: Knee deep water formed by an overflowing well near the middle of the patch makes this area ideal for the exotic cranberry.  The little red produce covers the water in all directions, making hypnotizing waves whenever the wind breezes slightly.  Tall coconut trees rise like towers in the wind just east of here. Small tomato bushes begin where the water ends directly north.  The cranberry patch runs into an empty lot in the west, and healthy looking grape vines lie just a little to the south of the cranberry patch.

rooms.name: A Vacant Lot
rooms.description: The farmer hasn't decided what to plant in this area in between a row of pumpkin patches and carrot plants.  A wide cranberry patch lies directly east, and a small hut with a large cloud of gray smoke directly above its brick chimney lies west of here.

rooms.name: The Fruit Wizard's Flower Altar
rooms.description: A dazzling array of colors and petals float around the area, making everything seem vibrant and alive.  The Fruit Wizard uses this area to meditate and prepare for a long day ahead.  A small altar lies in the middle of a path surrounded by purple, yellow, even green colored flowers of all kind.  A wall of thick vine with flowers entwined in the majestic natural barrier blocks entry to the south.  A small tidy picket fence lies directly west of here and a path covered in multicolored petals can be followed to the north or east.

rooms.name: The Carrot Row
rooms.description: Small sprouts of green leaves dot everywhere in the ground in no particular order.  Some of the carrots have been overturned by greedy animals scavenging for food.  A large vacant lot lies directly north of here and a small tidy path with pretty flowers on both sides begins in the west.  A large natural wall of vine entwined with multicolored flowers blocks passage south.

rooms.name: A Bunch of Large Grape Vines
rooms.description: You find yourself in a heavily vined area with small groupings of grapes in colors of purple, red and green.  The vines in this area don't seem to be all like grapes, but some lead off to a large jungle that erupts out of the ground in immeasurable exotic trees.  A patch of cranberries sit in a flooded well to the north, and small crops of regular produce lie directly to the west.

rooms.name: Dense Jungle Banana Trees
rooms.description: Trees that seem taken out of jungle books and placed on the farm boggles the mind.  Large yellow fruit that grows in clumps of ten to twelve fill the massive tree.  The ground beneath you isn't the regular dirt you remember on normal farms, large green plants lie in every available space.  Large vines connect tree to tree.  Little furry creatures make strange noises while looking oddly at you.  And on top of it all a light rain drizzles from above the trees. You can force your way to the north or west.

rooms.name: The South-Western Pastures
rooms.description: Vast rolling green hills showing no indication of an end fill your vision of the east, south, and west.  Farm animal sounds can be heard in every direction and a large white picket fence seperates the south-western pastures from the north-western pastures directly north of here.  A small hand dug canal lined with decaying wood timbers begins is journey south and hooks up from the pond northwest of here.

rooms.name: Next to a Pinewood Forest
rooms.description: Loose mud overflows from a small pond with plenty of reeds and slimy filth to keep a stench that will last through the dry seasons.  A great forest rises up west of here, the farmer has tried to clear some of it to make more room for farmlands, but its dense nature and thick pines make all efforts useless.

rooms.name: Next to a Pinewood Forest
rooms.description: Rich green pastures well kept and irrigated fills your vision of the rolling hills north, east and south of here.  Tall pine trees spring from the ground to make an amazing forest filled with untold adventure.  It seems like you might be able to squeeze between two pinewoods to the west.

rooms.name: The South-Western Pastures
rooms.description: Hills that stretch for miles in every direction also carry various animal sounds from all over the farm.  A large canal carries fresh water from a nearby stream to irrigate the greenest parts of the pasture, making the grass rich and green for the well-fed animals.

rooms.name: The South-Western Pastures
rooms.description: Rich green pastures well kept and irrigated fills your vision of the rolling hills north and west of here.  A tidy white picket fence cuts the road off from any curious animals directly east.  Huge trees rise up above the next rounded hill to the south.

rooms.name: A Cluster of Anduin Pinewoods
rooms.description: You are among the fabled towering Anduin pinewoods.  These immeasurable trees rarely grow in other areas of the world.  It is known that the wood of the pinewoods have been aged to an almost steel like texture.  An inscription has been carved into the trunk of one of the great pinewoods.  Rolling hills continue to the north and west.

rooms.name: The South-Western Pastures
rooms.description: Large rolling hills stretch its green fingers across the lands north and west of here.  A large canal carries fresh water from a nearby stream to irrigate the greenest parts of the pasture and disappears underneath a normal white picket fence that seperates the pastures from dry brushlands directly south.  Rising pinewoods can be seen clearly from this distance across the pastures eastwards.

rooms.name: Next to a Pinewood Forest
rooms.description: A huge forest springs up its towering trees directly west of here.  Its barrier trees can be followed to the north.  A plain looking fence seperates rugged brushlands to the south and vast-stretching pastures fill your vision to the nearby north and east.

rooms.name: The Forgotten Trail
rooms.description: This ancient trail was probably used by the first family to settle on the land.  Fallen pines litter the path and the thick canopy of branches block out most of the light above the trees.  Ominous animal sounds can be heard all around you, and a faint musk scent fills the air.  The trail continues to the west and an opening between two large pines show rich, green rolling hills to the east.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Forgotten Trail
rooms.description: It is hard not to follow the distinct path through the forest, although the path is almost completely hidden underneath fallen logs and forest brush. Large trees line both sides of the forgotten trail, making a distinct outline of the trail that continues to the north and east.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Forgotten Trail
rooms.description: As you continue on the trail you notice that the row of trees on the opposite sides of the buried trail must have been placed there for a purpose, for a break in the great pines show the forest not as dense as the path leads it out to be.  The trail makes a sharp corner that continues either to the south or west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Forgotten Trail
rooms.description: This forgotten trail has long been abandoned.  What appears to have been a statue's hand has embedded itself in between forest shrub.  The hand is gigantic, its once pearly white texture is now green and brown with age. Whatever statue that needed a hand that big must have been titanic!  The trail continues to the north and east.

rooms.name: A Dip in the Forgotten Trail
rooms.description: A small break through the trees in the west reveals a large canyon, with a continuous rushing river down below.  Parallel to your position and across the canyon shrubland fills your vision for as far as you can see.  The path takes a steep vertical drop, but a large willow tree can be hopped from the sudden cliff.  It looks like you could follow it down from here, or continue through the forest directly south.

rooms.name: A Large Willow Tree
rooms.description: A large willow tree with branches so long they nearly brush the ground stands proudly right in front of you.  Its long and thin branches move in the wind, slighty touching your cheek or an arm.  The trail continues to the north, but a large cliff stops you dead directly south of here, the rough bark of the willow tree looks sturdy enough to support your weight if you decide to climb up the tree.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Forgotten Trail
rooms.description: As you continue on the trail you notice that the row of trees on the opposite sides of the buried trail must have been placed there for a purpose, for a break in the great pines show the forest not as dense as the path leads it out to be.  The trail makes a sharp corner that continues either to the east or south.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Forgotten Trail
rooms.description: It is hard not to follow the distinct path through the forest, although the path is almost completely hidden underneath fallen logs and forest brush. Large trees line both sides of the forgotten trail, making a distinct outline of the trail that makes a bend from north to west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Forgotten Trail
rooms.description: This ancient trail was probably used by the first family to settle on the land.  Fallen pines litter the path and the thick canopy of branches block out most of the light above the trees.  Ominous animal sounds can be heard all around you, and a faint musk scent fills the air.  The trail continues to the south and west.

rooms.name: The Forgotten Trail
rooms.description: This ancient trail was probably used by the first family to settle on the land.  Fallen pines litter the path and the thick canopy of branches block out most of the light above the trees.  Ominous animal sounds can be heard all around you, and a faint musk scent fills the air.  The trail dips downward to the west and an opening between two large pines show rich, green rolling hills to the east.

rooms.name: South Bank of a Raging River
rooms.description: You are in a large clearing where the pastures and a small opening to the woods merge.  Directly north of you rages a large river, unnaturally rushing water spills over the bank and slaps the bare rock on the opposite bank with a booming echo.  You can follow the river east.

rooms.name: South Bank of a Raging River
rooms.description: A river full of crashing waves and an ocean-like glimmer flows just north of you.  The waves dance among the banks tempting to swallow up anything that dares stand in its way.  You can follow the river east or west, and a large pasture begins directly south.

rooms.name: South Bank of a Raging River
rooms.description: A river full of crashing waves and an ocean-like glimmer flows just north of you.  The waves dance among the banks tempting to swallow up anything that dares stand in its way.  You can follow the river east or west, and a large pasture begins directly south.

rooms.name: A Jagged Granite Wall
rooms.description: The river slaps the bare granite wall directly east of you and swirls into a large bend northeast of here seeming to end its destructiveness at this point. You can fight the current and climb onto the south bank by trudging west or climb the jagged granite wall up.

rooms.name: The Top of a Vertical Cliff
rooms.description: From this cliff you can get a glimpse of a great view of the river.  It fades in from the west where a low hills loom.  The river winds its way down and disappears underneath the edge of the cliff, to the south and west the granite gives way to rich green grass.

rooms.name: A Large Patch of Wildflowers
rooms.description: Although most of the room is covered with grass, the largest patches of dandelions and wildflowers have been enriched in nutrients by the common grounds of the never-ending cow dung.  A muddy bank begins directly north of here and pastures continue to the east, south, and west as far as you can see.

rooms.name: The North-Western Pastures
rooms.description: A huge stretch of soft grasslands stretch for spans in all directions.  A grouping of flowers are clumped together in small patches giving this area the perfect look of an unspoiled land.

rooms.name: Next to a Pinewood Forest
rooms.description: A gigantic mass of trees thicker than most houses come together in a jungle like density.  An overspilling canopy of branches and leaves make a natural roof above your head.  Pastures continue to the north and east, directly south a large pond takes shape.

rooms.name: The Watering Hole
rooms.description: This small expanse of water is too deep to walk in yet the green slime and muddy filth floating around you would make most people run for fresh air. Small reeds break the slime coat appearing in sheaves and clusters.  Large rolling hills continue to the north and east.

rooms.name: East Bank of a Large Watering Hole
rooms.description: A large clearing in reeds and filth shows some fresh water just west of you taking the shape of a wide pond.  Where the water comes from must be hidden deep in the forest west of it.  A large hand dug canal drains some of the pond into its muddy surface and continues its snail pace wake into the surrounding grounds just east of here.

rooms.name: The North-Western Pastures
rooms.description: Rolling hills of green pastures fill your vision of the north, east and west grounds.  A large hand dug canal makes a sharp bend here leading from a small pond in the distant west and disappears underneath a white tidy fence directly south of here.

rooms.name: The North-Western Pastures
rooms.description: The area around you is a great grazing ground for a farm's various livestock.  Green grass and patches of wild flowers would please any animals' hungry appetite.  A large barn rises up its massive walls of rosy red directly south of here and the pastures continue to the north and west.

rooms.name: &0A Meadow of &3&bGolden&0 Grass
rooms.description: The grass twists from a gleaming golden tinge on one side, and the normal rich green color that is a common sight in the surrounding pastures.  A small tidy horse path that looks well ridden begins in the north and east.

rooms.name: A Small Riding Trail
rooms.description: The path is beatened down and hard packed with small sprouts of grass clinging to the hard mud exterior.  Hooves are embedded in the dry surface in every other step, making a collage of various sized horses.  The trail continues to the east and opens into a wide meadow directly west of here.

rooms.name: A Small Riding Trail
rooms.description: Two long ditches run on both sides of the canal, wide enough to jump across but trees overflow into the ditches from the small woods north and south of the path.  The trail continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: A Small Riding Trail
rooms.description: Small hurdles appear off the side of the trail, one each taller than the next.  They were made to train horses to jump various sizes of fences.  A large mangled piece of wood is what remains of a failed attempt to jump one of the larger hurdles.  The path continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: A Small Riding Trail
rooms.description: The hard packed riding trail sprays light dust into the air as a slight breeze catches the light particles.  The dense woodlands give way to beautiful golden tinged meadows surrounding the valley directly south of here.  The small riding trail continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: &0A Meadow of &3&bGolden&0 Grass
rooms.description: The grass twists from a gleaming golden tinge on one side, and the normal rich green color that is a common sight in the surrounding pastures.  The golden meadows continue to the east, and a small tidy path runs east-west directly north of here.

rooms.name: &0A Meadow of &3&bGolden&0 Grass
rooms.description: The grass twists from a gleaming golden tinge on one side, and the normal rich green color that is a common sight in the surrounding pastures.  The golden meadow continues to the west, and a small horse trail connects with the northern boundary of the meadows.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Trail
rooms.description: Faint bird calls are heard in the surrounding forests, singing their songs for prospective mates in nearby trees.  The distinct path makes a slight bend here, running its lengths to the north and west.  A vast open meadow with a golden tinge lies directly south.

rooms.name: A Small Riding Trail
rooms.description: The narrow riding trail is only wide enough for a single horse or pony. Overgrowth from the surrounding forest spills over the parallel ditches running off the sides of the trail.  The pleasant sounds of woodland creatures gives the area a peaceful nature.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Trail
rooms.description: The narrow riding trail is only wide enough for a single horse or pony. Overgrowth from the surrounding forest spills over the parallel ditches running off the sides of the trail.  The pleasant sounds of woodland creatures gives the area a peaceful nature.  The trail makes a small bend that can be followed south or west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Trail
rooms.description: The narrow riding trail is only wide enough for a single horse or pony. Overgrowth from the surrounding forest spills over the parallel ditches running off the sides of the trail.  The pleasant sounds of woodland creatures gives the area a peaceful nature.  The trail makes a slight bend that can be followed either north or east.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Trail
rooms.description: A steady flowing stream runs swiftly across the northern border of this small riding trail.  The bank consists of hard packed mud and trees that shade the small rapid stream with its long outstretched branches.  The trail makes a sharp bend that can be followed either south or west.

rooms.name: A Small Riding Trail
rooms.description: A steady flowing stream runs swiftly across the northern border of this small riding trail.  The bank consists of hard packed mud and trees that shade the small rapid stream with its long outstretched branches.  The trail begins to make a steady increase in width as the forest becomes less dense.

rooms.name: A Small Riding Trail
rooms.description: A steady flowing stream runs swiftly across the northern border of this small riding trail.  The bank consists of hard packed mud and trees that shade the small rapid stream with its long outstretched branches.  The trail begins to make a steady increase in width as the forest becomes less dense.

rooms.name: A Small Riding Trail
rooms.description: A steady flowing stream runs swiftly across the northern border of this small riding trail.  The bank consists of hard packed mud and trees that shade the small rapid stream with its long outstretched branches.  The trail begins to make a steady increase in width as the forest becomes less dense.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Trail
rooms.description: A steady flowing stream runs swiftly across the northern border of this small riding trail.  The bank consists of hard packed mud and trees that shade the small rapid stream with its long outstretched branches.  The trail makes a sharp bend that can be followed either east or south.

rooms.name: A Small Riding Trail
rooms.description: A tidy white picket fence and a couple of rich, thick oak trees seperate this horse trail from the green pastures directly west of here.  There is plenty of room to ride around as the trail opens up to a small meadow cleared just for the horses to graze in peace.  The trail continues to the north and south.

rooms.name: A Small Riding Trail
rooms.description: A tidy white picket fence and a couple of rich, thick oak trees seperate this horse trail from the green pastures directly west of here.  There is plenty of room to ride around as the trail opens up to a small meadow cleared just for the horses to graze in peace.  The trail continues to the north and opens up to a meadow of golden grass south of here.

rooms.name: &0A Glade of &8&bGreen&0 Moss
rooms.description: The mighty oaks give way to a soft field of moss.  The green and white buds sprout out in an almost infestation of the surrounding areas north and east of here.  A small riding trail lies just off the side of the clearing through some thick pinewoods directly west of here.

rooms.name: &0A Glade of &8&bGreen&0 Moss
rooms.description: The mighty oaks give way to a soft field of moss.  The green and white buds sprout out in an almost infestation of the surrounding areas north east and west of here.  An oak so huge it is beyond perception stretches its highway length limbs high above the crest of the next hill.

rooms.name: &0A Glade of &8&bGreen&0 Moss
rooms.description: The field of green moss goes no further east and south of here, but gives to a grove of towering Anduin pinewoods that block entry to the rest of this ancient forest east and south of here.  The green hills of moss continue to the north and west.

rooms.name: &0A Glade of &8&bGreen&0 Moss
rooms.description: Huge oaks tower from the west give way to an unnatural growth of white moss. Huge branches stretch towards you from their source east in the sky, towering like a proud castle.  The fields of moss can be followed to the north or south, and the mother tree easily forms over the next rise.

rooms.name: The Mother Tree
rooms.description: Alone in the middle of the clearing stands an oak so enormous it is hard to accept that it could be alive.  Here and there in its mossy trunk openings almost like caverns, and its lower limbs are as broad as highways and they spread out to shade nearly the entire clearing.  There is about the tree a sense of vast age and a patient wisdom.

rooms.name: &0A Glade of &8&bGreen&0 Moss
rooms.description: Boulders begin to dot the fields of moss, placed randomly as if thrown from afar.  Branches thicker then any normal tree tower above your head and points as true as an arrow to the source of their existence directly west.

rooms.name: &0A Glade of &8&bGreen&0 Moss
rooms.description: You are in an unfinished room.

rooms.name: &0A Glade of &8&bGreen&0 Moss
rooms.description: You are in an unfinished room.

rooms.name: &0A Glade of &8&bGreen&0 Moss
rooms.description: q

rooms.name: Forgotten Trail
rooms.description: Trees have fallen across the trail, and bushes grow everywhere.  The faint path is barely visible but appears to lead north and south.  It is difficult to see very far due to the dense forest and thick undergrowth.  There are few noises other than the occasional animal sound, or the whispering of the wind through the trees' upper branches.

rooms.name: A Dip in the Forgotten Trail
rooms.description: The trail dips low as it passes through the pines.  The smell of animals fills the air and the sound of rushing water is nearby to the north.  It is difficult to see very far due to the thick forest all around.  The trail rises to the east and continues level to the west.

rooms.name: A Small Swamp
rooms.description: A slow seepage of water from the north soaks the ground, letting reeds and algae grow here in the mud.  The mighty trees of the forest grow to the east and west.  The water looks a bit clearer and deeper to the north, and continues to flow south a short distance.  It looks like a good place for mosquitos to breed.

rooms.name: Riengale's Palace of Building
rooms.description: Left, Right, Up, Down, everywhere maps of different areas lie half- finished and half forgotten.  A large fireplace blazes through the night, making the room nice and cozy.  A large window depicts a night full of twinkling stars. A large map is unrolled on a massive desk, obviously his current project.  It shows little rooms with green painted marks everywhere.  Wonder what he's working on ... Down = God Board North = Tanle's Hall West = Mail Room
